com.nttdocomo.util
Interface EventListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
ComponentListener, KeyListener, MediaListener, SoftKeyListener, TimerListener
public interface EventListener

This is an interface for receiving event notifications. This is the base for all listener interfaces. Methods and fields are not defined.
